=Installation Instructions=

Download sources from here:
# wget http://labyrinth-explorer.googlecode.com/files/labyrinth-explorer.zip

Extract it in your directory:
# unzip labyrinth-explorer.zip -d ~/labyrinth-explorer

Compile it:
# cd ~/labyrinth-explorer
# make

Start the game:
# ./labyrinth3rd

To import the project from SVN:
* svn checkout http://labyrinth-explorer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ labyrinth-explorer-read-only
